title: Deploy Workflow World for multi-agent trace observability
description: Deploy Workflow World instance to enable multi-agent trace observability. Required to complete Phase 3 success criteria: 'Observability shows multi-agent traces'. Priority: Low (infrastructure).

title: Implement CIBA auth flow with durable sleep
close_reason: Duplicate of a2a-js-sdk-examples-dco which is already closed

title: Fix number-game-alice Worker state persistence
description: The Worker version of Alice generates a new random secret number per request, making the game unplayable. Add Redis-based game state persistence using Upstash. Store session state (secret, attempts, createdAt) keyed by contextId or session cookie. TTL ~1 hour for abandoned games. See README evaluation in examples/agents/src/agents/number-game/README.md.

title: Implement MCP Registry with state persistence
description: Implement MCP Registry example (Example 06 from Python reference) with state persistence and re-planning patterns using Redis task stores. Foundation ready via existing Redis task store infrastructure. Priority: Medium.

title: Implement File Chat agent (LlamaIndex patterns)
description: Deferred from Python example 13. Blocked by Cloudflare Worker size limits for file parsing libraries. Requires: file upload handling (base64), PDF parsing, document context injection, citation extraction, multi-turn with document memory. See docs/python-examples-reference/13-llamaindex-file-chat.md for reference.

title: Add Workflow DevKit to adversarial-defender agent
description: Add durability to adversarial-defender with steps.ts and workflow.ts. Benefits from conversation history persistence for security testing scenarios. Priority: Medium.

title: Update examples/agents/README.md - outdated content
description: The README.md at examples/agents/README.md is outdated. It only mentions 3 agents (movie, coder, content-editor) and references old ports (41241-41243). The actual codebase has 19+ agents with different port assignments. Should be updated to reflect current state or simplified to link to main README.

title: Update README documentation section with organized links
description: The README.md documentation section references a non-existent REPO_REFOCUS_PLAN.md. Update to properly link to: docs/SEPARATION-PATTERNS.md (architecture), docs/TELEMETRY.md (observability), docs/PLATFORM-PORTABILITY.md (deployment), and testing guides. Priority: Low (docs cleanup).

title: Evaluate number-game state persistence
description: Evaluate if number-game agents (number-game-alice, number-game-carol) need state persistence migration. Currently use custom JSON-RPC implementation, not SDK task store. May need different approach. Priority: Low.

title: Implement auth flow with durable sleep (CIBA pattern)
description: Implement Client-Initiated Backchannel Authentication (CIBA) pattern with durable polling. Foundation exists in examples/agents/src/agents/auth-agent/ and examples/agents/src/shared/security-schemes.ts. Needs durable sleep for polling token endpoint. Priority: High.

title: Consolidate testing documentation (INSPECTOR_SETUP.md, DEV_TESTING.md, QUICKSTART_A2A_INSPECTOR.md)
description: Three root-level markdown files cover overlapping testing topics. Consolidate into a single comprehensive testing guide or create clear navigation between them. Files: INSPECTOR_SETUP.md (Docker setup), DEV_TESTING.md (dev workflow), QUICKSTART_A2A_INSPECTOR.md (quick start). Priority: Low (docs cleanup).

title: Add Workflow DevKit to code-review agent
description: Add durability to code-review agent with steps.ts and workflow.ts. Benefits from external tool retries with durability. Priority: Medium.

title: Update examples/agents/src/agents/README.md - outdated content
description: The README.md at examples/agents/src/agents/README.md is outdated. It only lists 3 agents (movie, coder, content-editor) with old port numbers. The actual codebase has 19+ agents. Should be updated or consolidated with parent README.
